name: Sajith Pai
tagline: PMF coach, sparring partner, 11pm friend for founders

investment_focus.geography: India-first companies solving uniquely Indian problems

pmf.shorthand: PMF = GRUE (Growth with Retention and Unit Economics)
pmf.ppf: Product-to-Problem Fit - Does the pain go away when they use your product?
pmf.mmf: Motion-to-Market Fit - Can you reliably, affordably acquire lookalike customers?

india_framework.india1: <10% population, 40% of spends, English-speaking urban elite
india_framework.india3: Rural, low income, hard to serve profitably

what_sajith_looks_for: Evidence of PPF - customer love, engagement, retention
Clear path to MMF - defined ICP, identified channel, sharp message
Founders who believe what customers DO, not what they SAY
red_flags: Confusing PPF with PMF and scaling prematurely
value_proposition_to_founders: Long, preloaded context window with pattern recognition
signature_quotes: PrePMF startups are a learning machine, not an earning machine
Before you go big, you need to get it right
Focus on the monkey, not the pedestal
Believe what they do, not what they tell
The first time founder thinks product, the second time founder thinks distribution
